Package io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.client.gui.screen.explorer

Class TFileChooserScreen

java.lang.Object
io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.client.gui.screen.TScreen
io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.client.gui.screen.TScreenPlus
io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.client.gui.screen.explorer.TFileChooserScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
TParentElement, IParentScreenProvider, IEnableStateProvider
public final class TFileChooserScreen extends TScreenPlus implements IParentScreenProvider
A file chooser screen that allows the user to choose a File for opening and saving.
See Also:
